channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- glib2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- glib2

item.title: CVE-2023-29499|2023-09-14T19:06:17.810Z -- n%2Fa -- glib2
item.description: A flaw was found in GLib. GVariant deserialization fails to validate that the input conforms to the expected format, leading to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2023-32665|2023-09-14T19:03:58.229Z -- n%2Fa -- glib2
item.description: A flaw was found in GLib. GVariant deserialization is vulnerable to an exponential blowup issue where a crafted GVariant can cause excessive processing, leading to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2023-32611|2023-09-14T19:07:19.011Z -- n%2Fa -- glib2
item.description: A flaw was found in GLib. GVariant deserialization is vulnerable to a slowdown issue where a crafted GVariant can cause excessive processing, leading to denial of service.
